column4: How can I get my system to ask me if I would change the names of my default folders when I log in? When I change languages now it doesn't ask me and I need to change the names of them.
Default folders? Typically, there are none. You just make them. However, there are few folders (with certain symbolic icons). Downloads, Pictures, Documents, Templates, etc.

Right, those are the ones that change when your change your locale. Normally it asks you if you would like to change the language of them as well when you change locales. However, I checked the box to have it no longer ask.
Ah. English is the only (and primary) language for me. :3
